#summary Create and configure build environment.
#labels denvironment,build

= Create build environment =

At this moment build procedure support Linux and Windows only. 

== Mandatory items ==

Java 1.6

Installed Java JAI 1.1.3  http://java.sun.com/javase/technologies/desktop/media/jai/

Flex SDK 4 http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Downloads 

Maven 2.2.1 http://maven.apache.org/download.html

Ant http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi

Tomcat at least 5.5.28 version http://tomcat.apache.org/

SVN (with *svnwcrev*) or Tortuse

Oracle XE or MySQL(see WAMP/LAMP in nice to have section) or MSSQL



== Nice to have ==

Jetbrains Idea IDE or Eclipse IDE

WAMP or LAMP

Http server shall be configured with ajp 1.3 support.

Hexagon Alcon

TOAD for mysql or some db tool for target rdbms

Visual paradigm community edition

Local email SMTP/POP3 server



== OS enviroment variables shall be like following ==

ANT_OPTS=-Xms256m -Xmx1124m -XX:MaxPermSize=256m

CATALINA_OPTS=-Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

JAVA_HOME=d:\jdk1.6.0_17

JAVA_OPTS=-Xms256m -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=256m

JBOSS_HOME=D:\dev\jboss-4.2.3.GA

M2_HOME=D:\apache-maven-2.1.0

PATH=d:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin;D:\wamp\bin\mysql\mysql5.1.36\bin;D:\apache-maven-2.1.0\bin;D:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin;D:\flex_sdk_4\bin


== Build ==

mvn install
